description: domed roof on light green squarish building with lattice work all over; man on front side holding tray-like object; he stands on uppermost step of 5 steps.
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

On proper right side of building in relief: [HALLIS / LILIPUT / BANK]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [# 113-17 / \"Hallis Liliput\" III / 6985 4165 / # 146M]
title: "Hall's Liliput Bank, with Tray" mechanical bank
